---
title: "02 Supervised ML"
author: "Rishon Noel Saldanha"
params:
  data_dir: "../../data/"
---



Load the absolute path to the data directory.



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
data_dir <- params$data_dir
```
:::



# Libraries


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidymodels)
library(tidyverse)
library(recipes)
library(rsample)
library(yardstick)
```
:::



# Data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
bike_features_tbl <- readRDS("C:/Users/risho/OneDrive/Desktop/internship_sparks/ss24-bdml-rishon1234/ML/data/Business Decisions with Machine Learning/bike_features_tbl.rds")
bike_features_tbl |> as_tibble() |> print()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
#> # A tibble: 231 × 67
#>    bike_id model    model_year frame_material weight price category_1 category_2

#> #   Chain <chr>, Stem <chr>, Handlebar <chr>, Headset <chr>, Motor <chr>, …
```


:::
:::



Transform dataset


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
bike_features_trafo_tbl <- bike_features_tbl %>% 
    select(model:url, `Rear Derailleur`, `Shift Lever`) %>%
    mutate_if(is.numeric, ~replace(., is.na(.), 0)) %>%
    mutate(id = row_number()) %>% 
    select(id, everything(), -url)
bike_features_trafo_tbl |> as_tibble() |> print()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
#> # A tibble: 231 × 12
#>       id model      model_year frame_material weight price category_1 category_2
#>    <int> <chr>           <dbl> <chr>           <dbl> <dbl> <chr>      <chr>     
#>  1     1 Aeroad CF…       2020 carbon           7.6   4579 Road       Race      
#>  2     2 Aeroad CF…       2020 carbon           7.27  6919 Road       Race      
#>  3     3 Aeroad CF…       2020 carbon           7.1   6429 Road       Race      
#>  4     4 Aeroad CF…       2020 carbon           7.73  5069 Road       Race      
#>  5     5 Aeroad CF…       2020 carbon           7.83  3609 Road       Race      
#>  6     6 Aeroad CF…       2019 carbon           6.8   6139 Road       Race      
#>  7     7 Aeroad CF…       2019 carbon           6.8   5359 Road       Race      
#>  8     8 Aeroad CF…       2021 carbon           7.6   2629 Road       Race      
#>  9     9 Aeroad CF…       2020 carbon           7.3   3699 Road       Race      
#> 10    10 Aeroad WM…       2020 carbon           7.2   3219 Road       Race      
#> # ℹ 221 more rows
#> # ℹ 4 more variables: category_3 <chr>, gender <chr>, `Rear Derailleur` <chr>,
#> #   `Shift Lever` <chr>
```


:::
:::



Create training and testing dataset (Hold-out method)


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
bike_features_trafo_tbl %>% distinct(category_2) %>% print()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
#> # A tibble: 20 × 1
#>    category_2    
#>    <chr>         
#>  1 Race          
#>  2 Endurance     
#>  3 E-Road        
#>  4 Cyclocross    
#>  5 Triathlon Bike
#>  6 Fat Bikes     
#>  7 Cross-Country 
#>  8 Adventure     
#>  9 All-Road      
#> 10 E-Gravel      
#> 11 Trail         
#> 12 E-Mountain    
#> 13 Downhill      
#> 14 Dirt Jump     
#> 15 Enduro        
#> 16 E-City        
#> 17 E-Trekking    
#> 18 E-Fitness     
#> 19 City          
#> 20 Touring
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
set.seed(123)
split <- initial_split(bike_features_trafo_tbl, prop = 3/4, strata = "category_2")

split %>% training() %>% distinct(category_2) %>% print()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
#> # A tibble: 19 × 1
#>    category_2    
#>    <chr>         
#>  1 Race          
#>  2 Endurance     
#>  3 Cyclocross    
#>  4 Triathlon Bike
#>  5 Fat Bikes     
#>  6 Cross-Country 
#>  7 All-Road      
#>  8 E-Gravel      
#>  9 E-Mountain    
#> 10 Downhill      
#> 11 Dirt Jump     
#> 12 Enduro        
#> 13 E-City        
#> 14 E-Trekking    
#> 15 E-Fitness     
#> 16 Touring       
#> 17 City          
#> 18 Adventure     
#> 19 Trail
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
split %>% testing() %>% distinct(category_2) %>% print()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
#> # A tibble: 15 × 1
#>    category_2    
#>    <chr>         
#>  1 Race          
#>  2 Endurance     
#>  3 E-Road        
#>  4 Cyclocross    
#>  5 Triathlon Bike
#>  6 Cross-Country 
#>  7 Adventure     
#>  8 E-Gravel      
#>  9 All-Road      
#> 10 Trail         
#> 11 E-Mountain    
#> 12 Enduro        
#> 13 E-Trekking    
#> 14 City          
#> 15 Touring
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
train_tbl <- training(split)
test_tbl  <- testing(split)

train_tbl <- train_tbl %>% set_names(str_replace_all(names(train_tbl), " |-", "_"))
test_tbl  <- test_tbl  %>% set_names(str_replace_all(names(test_tbl),  " |-", "_"))
```
:::







# Visualization


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
g1 <- bike_features_trafo_tbl %>% 
    mutate(category_2 = as.factor(category_2) %>% 
           fct_reorder(price)) %>% 
    
    ggplot(aes(category_2, price)) +
    geom_violin() +
    geom_jitter(width = 0.1, alpha = 0.5, color = "#2dc6d6") +
    coord_flip() +
    facet_wrap(~ frame_material) +
    scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::dollar_format()) +
    labs(
        title = "Unit Price for Each Model",
        y = "", x = "Category 2"
    )
g1
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
